member.name: M:Unigine.SystemInfo.getCPUFrequency
member.summary: Returns the current CPU frequency.
member.returns: Current CPU frequency, in MHz.

member.name: M:Unigine.SystemInfo.getCPUThreads
member.summary: Returns the number of available CPU threads.
member.returns: Number of available CPU threads.

member.name: M:Unigine.SystemInfo.hasMMX
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the system supports MMX (Multi-Media Extensions).
member.returns: true if the system supports MMX extension; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.SystemInfo.hasSSE
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the system supports SSE (Streaming SIMD Extensions).
member.returns: true if the system supports SSE extension; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the system supports SSE2 (Streaming SIMD Extensions).
member.returns: true if the system supports SSE2 extension; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the system supports SSE3 (Streaming SIMD Extensions).
member.returns: true if the system supports SSE3 extension; otherwise, false.

member.returns: true if the system supports SSE4 extension; otherwise, false.

member.returns: true if the system supports SSE5 extension; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.SystemInfo.getGPUCount
member.summary: Returns the number of available GPUs.
member.returns: Number of available GPUs.

member.name: M:Unigine.SystemInfo.getGPUMemory(int)
member.summary: Returns the video memory size for the video adapter with the specified number.
member.returns: Video memory size, in Mbytes.

member.name: M:Unigine.SystemInfo.getGPUID(int)
member.summary: Returns the GPU ID for the video adapter with the specified number in the list of detected ones.
member.param: Number of the graphics adapter (GPU) in the list of detected ones.
member.returns: GPU ID for the video adapter with the specified number.

member.name: M:Unigine.SystemInfo.getOSInfo
member.summary: Returns the operating system information: its name, edition, and build.
member.returns: Operating system information.

member.name: M:Unigine.SystemInfo.getEngineInfo
member.summary: Returns the complete information on the engine: version number, release/debug, revision, date.
member.returns: Complete engine information.

member.returns: The total amount of unused memory.

member.summary: Returns the amount of unused committed memory, in Mbytes.

member.summary: Returns the total amount of memory, in Mbytes.

member.returns: The GPU index, or -1 if no GPU is found.
